hero.title: Jamnagar Brass Industries
hero.subtitle: Precision Components Manufacturing Excellence
hero.description: With 13 years of expertise and a state-of-the-art 50,000 sq ft manufacturing facility, we specialize in high-precision brass components for automotive and pneumatic applications. Our advanced production capabilities include 80+ semi-automatic and 25 CNC machines, enabling 24/7 manufacturing of top-quality components.
